name: Neon Doodle Light Bulb Blast
description:
Are you fast enough to smash all these neon light bulbs?

It's time to test your reflexes. Tap as many light bulbs as you can before they glow too bright and explode. Can you beat the pressure of the countdown timer? Test your speed against your friends and see who comes out on top!

Features include:

* Beautiful, fun graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Smooth physics for nice gameplay
* Addictive gaming

Download right now!
